languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, {mf|господин|госпожа} фон Валанциус! Конечно же, я слышал о вашем прилете на Футфол... и о кончине госпожи Теодоры... но никто не предупредил... вас не было в списке гостей..." {n}Он осекается.{/n} "Конечно, это не проблема, прошу вас, проходите — Капеллан вот-вот начнет церемонию! Ах, где же только гость Фиделио... если он не появится, все пойдет прахом..." {n}Бормоча извинения, мужчина отходит на свое место среди гостей.{/n}

"{mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I heard about your arrival on Footfall, of course... and about Lady Theodora's passing... but I wasn't told... you're not on the list..." {n}He stops.{/n} "But that's not a problem, of course! Please, come on in — Chaplain is about to begin! Ah, but we're waiting for one more attendee to arrive, Fidelio... without Fidelio, it's all been for nothing..." {n}Mumbling, the man excuses himself and joins the other attendees.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, {mf|господин|госпожа} фон Валанциус! Ah, but we're waiting for one more attendee to arrive, Fidelio... without Fidelio, it's all been for nothing..." {n}Mumbling, the man excuses himself and joins the other attendees.{/n}

languages.text: “冯·瓦兰修斯家族的行商浪人！我听说你来到了落脚港，大人……也知道了西奥多拉夫人夫人亡故的消息……不过并没有人告诉我说你会来这里……你并不在名单上……”{n}他顿了顿。{/n}“不过当然了，这都不是问题！牧师马上就要开始致辞了！呃，不过我们还在等另一位成员，叫菲迪奥……如果菲迪奥不来的话，这一切都毫无意义……”{n}这个男人嘟囔了几句之后，向你道了别，加入了其他与会者的行列。{/n}
languages.original_text: "{mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I heard about your arrival on Footfall, of course... and about Lady Theodora's passing... but I wasn't told... you're not on the list..." {n}He stops.{/n} "But that's not a problem, of course! Please, come on in — Chaplain is about to begin! Ah, but we're waiting for one more attendee to arrive, Fidelio... without Fidelio, it's all been for nothing..." {n}Mumbling, the man excuses himself and joins the other attendees.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “冯·瓦兰修斯家族的行商浪人！我听说你来到了落脚港，大人……也知道了西奥多拉夫人夫人亡故的消息……不过并没有人告诉我说你会来这里……你并不在名单上……”{n}他顿了顿。{/n}“不过当然了，这都不是问题！牧师马上就要开始致辞了！呃，不过我们还在等另一位成员，叫菲迪奥……如果菲迪奥不来的话，这一切都毫无意义……”{n}这个男人嘟囔了几句之后，向你道了别，加入了其他与会者的行列。{/n}

languages.text: «¡{mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius! Mi{mf|lord|lady}, había oído hablar de su llegada a Paso, por supuesto... y del fallecimiento de lady Theodora... pero no me informaron... no está en la lista...». {n}Hace una pausa.{/n} «Pero ¡eso no es problema, por supuesto! Adelante, por favor, ¡Capellán está a punto de empezar! Ah, pero estamos esperando la llegada de una última persona, Fidelio... sin Fidelio, todo esto habrá sido en vano...». {n}Entre murmullos, el hombre se disculpa y se une al resto de asistentes.{/n}
languages.original_text: "{mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I heard about your arrival on Footfall, of course... and about Lady Theodora's passing... but I wasn't told... you're not on the list..." {n}He stops.{/n} "But that's not a problem, of course! Please, come on in — Chaplain is about to begin! Ah, but we're waiting for one more attendee to arrive, Fidelio... without Fidelio, it's all been for nothing..." {n}Mumbling, the man excuses himself and joins the other attendees.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡{mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius! Mi{mf|lord|lady}, había oído hablar de su llegada a Paso, por supuesto... y del fallecimiento de lady Theodora... pero no me informaron... no está en la lista...». {n}Hace una pausa.{/n} «Pero ¡eso no es problema, por supuesto! Adelante, por favor, ¡Capellán está a punto de empezar! Ah, pero estamos esperando la llegada de una última persona, Fidelio... sin Fidelio, todo esto habrá sido en vano...». {n}Entre murmullos, el hombre se disculpa y se une al resto de asistentes.{/n}

languages.text: 「フォン・ヴァランシウス陛下ですね！陛下、あなたがフットフォールに到着したという話は耳にしていました…シオドーラ様が亡くなったということも…しかし、ここにいらっしゃるとは…リストにも記載がない…」{n}彼はぴたりと動きを止めた。{/n}「とはいえ、まったく問題ございません！どうぞお入りください。まもなく教戒官の話がはじまります！ああ、そういえばもうひとり、フィデリオという名の参加者が来るのを待っています。フィデリオがいなければ、これまでのことが無駄になってしまう…」{n}男はぶつぶつと呟きながら席を立ち、他の参加者と合流した。{/n}
languages.original_text: "{mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I heard about your arrival on Footfall, of course... and about Lady Theodora's passing... but I wasn't told... you're not on the list..." {n}He stops.{/n} "But that's not a problem, of course! Please, come on in — Chaplain is about to begin! Ah, but we're waiting for one more attendee to arrive, Fidelio... without Fidelio, it's all been for nothing..." {n}Mumbling, the man excuses himself and joins the other attendees.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「フォン・ヴァランシウス陛下ですね！陛下、あなたがフットフォールに到着したという話は耳にしていました…シオドーラ様が亡くなったということも…しかし、ここにいらっしゃるとは…リストにも記載がない…」{n}彼はぴたりと動きを止めた。{/n}「とはいえ、まったく問題ございません！どうぞお入りください。まもなく教戒官の話がはじまります！ああ、そういえばもうひとり、フィデリオという名の参加者が来るのを待っています。フィデリオがいなければ、これまでのことが無駄になってしまう…」{n}男はぶつぶつと呟きながら席を立ち、他の参加者と合流した。{/n}

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius! Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich habe natürlich von Eurer Ankunft auf Footfall gehört ... und von Lady Theodoras Dahinscheiden ... aber mir wurde nicht gesagt ... Ihr steht nicht auf der Liste ..." {n}Er hält inne.{/n} "Aber das ist natürlich kein Problem! Bitte tretet ein – Ordenspriester wird gleich beginnen! Äh, wir warten allerdings noch auf einen weiteren Teilnehmer, Fidelio ... ohne Fidelio war alles umsonst ..." {n}Murmelnd entschuldigt sich der Mann und tritt zu den übrigen Teilnehmern.{/n}
languages.original_text: "{mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I heard about your arrival on Footfall, of course... and about Lady Theodora's passing... but I wasn't told... you're not on the list..." {n}He stops.{/n} "But that's not a problem, of course! Please, come on in — Chaplain is about to begin! Ah, but we're waiting for one more attendee to arrive, Fidelio... without Fidelio, it's all been for nothing..." {n}Mumbling, the man excuses himself and joins the other attendees.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius! Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich habe natürlich von Eurer Ankunft auf Footfall gehört ... und von Lady Theodoras Dahinscheiden ... aber mir wurde nicht gesagt ... Ihr steht nicht auf der Liste ..." {n}Er hält inne.{/n} "Aber das ist natürlich kein Problem! Bitte tretet ein – Ordenspriester wird gleich beginnen! Äh, wir warten allerdings noch auf einen weiteren Teilnehmer, Fidelio ... ohne Fidelio war alles umsonst ..." {n}Murmelnd entschuldigt sich der Mann und tritt zu den übrigen Teilnehmern.{/n}

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur|Dame} von Valancius ! On m'a bien entendu informé de votre arrivée à Castel, Votre Seigneurie... et du décès de dame Théodora également... En revanche, j'ignorais... Vous n'êtes pas sur la liste... » {n}Il s'interrompt un court instant.{/n} « Mais ça ne pose aucun problème, bien sûr ! Entrez, je vous en prie. Chapelain va bientôt commencer ! Ah, mais nous attendons encore une personne... Sans Fidélio, tout ça n'aura servi à rien... » {n}marmonne-t-il avant de s'excuser et de rejoindre les autres.{/n}
languages.original_text: "{mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I heard about your arrival on Footfall, of course... and about Lady Theodora's passing... but I wasn't told... you're not on the list..." {n}He stops.{/n} "But that's not a problem, of course! Please, come on in — Chaplain is about to begin! Ah, but we're waiting for one more attendee to arrive, Fidelio... without Fidelio, it's all been for nothing..." {n}Mumbling, the man excuses himself and joins the other attendees.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur|Dame} von Valancius ! On m'a bien entendu informé de votre arrivée à Castel, Votre Seigneurie... et du décès de dame Théodora également... En revanche, j'ignorais... Vous n'êtes pas sur la liste... » {n}Il s'interrompt un court instant.{/n} « Mais ça ne pose aucun problème, bien sûr ! Entrez, je vous en prie. Chapelain va bientôt commencer ! Ah, mais nous attendons encore une personne... Sans Fidélio, tout ça n'aura servi à rien... » {n}marmonne-t-il avant de s'excuser et de rejoindre les autres.{/n}

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} von Valancius! {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, Binliman'a gelişinizin haberini almıştım... Elbette Leydi Theodora'nın vefatını da işittim... Lakin bana bildirilmemişti... Listede adınız bulunmuyor..." {n}Duraklıyor.{/n} "Hiç sorun değil tabii ki! Buyurun lütfen. Papazın konuşması başlamak üzere! Gerçi bir davetlimiz daha var, onu bekliyoruz. Fidelio... Fidelio teşrif etmedikçe her şey boşuna." {n}Adam mırıldanarak izin isteyip diğer katılımcıların yanına ilerliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "{mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I heard about your arrival on Footfall, of course... and about Lady Theodora's passing... but I wasn't told... you're not on the list..." {n}He stops.{/n} "But that's not a problem, of course! Please, come on in — Chaplain is about to begin! Ah, but we're waiting for one more attendee to arrive, Fidelio... without Fidelio, it's all been for nothing..." {n}Mumbling, the man excuses himself and joins the other attendees.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} von Valancius'sunuz! {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, Binliman'a geldiğinizin haberini pekâlâ almıştım... Leydi Theodora'nın vefatı konusunda... Bana söylenmemişti... Listede adınız yoktu..." {n}Duruyor.{/n} "Bu bir sorun değil tabii ki! Buyurun lütfen. Vaiz'in konuşması başlamak üzere! Bir davetlimiz daha var, onu bekliyoruz. Fidelio... Fidelio olmadan bunların bir değeri yok..." {n}Adam sayıklayarak izin isteyip diğer davetlilerin yanına ilerliyor.{/n}
